spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation and room adjacency. Door orientations are mostly accurate, though the laundry/kitchen entrance area is slightly cluttered. Window placement matches the plan perfectly.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof removed as required. No text labels or UI elements. Floating model on neutral background. Penalty applied for a minor structural hallucination: solid walls added to the garage which appears open-ended on the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is clean and accurate following block-style. Beds, dining set, and lounge furniture are correctly scaled and placed.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good low-poly style. Shadows are slightly more pronounced than 'flat shading' requires, but still falls within acceptable non-photorealistic stylized bounds.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated structural wall added to the rear of the garage which does not exist in the 2D source.
Slight layout distortion in the corridor/laundry transition area leading to crowded door clearances.
